channel.title: Need Help!
channel.description:
I want to make a system for the lumbridge swamp, where you have to make a fire to stay alive. If you are more then 4 tiles away from a fire for more then 30 seconds, you get hit by X damage. Also, if you do not eat for a minute, you also get hit by X damage.
BTW: I'm using 317 Homiescape.....
